Colophon

Land acknowledgement

This website was coded on land stolen from the Catawba Nation, Sioux Nation, and Lakota Nation.

Design & tech

Designed and built by yours truly in Minneapolis, Minnesota and Charlotte, North Carolina.

Coded in HTML5, CSS3, Markdown and Javascript using Panic Nova, and generated with Eleventy. Code hosted publicly on Github and deployed automatically with Netlify.

Iconography made on Sketch and converted into a font with Fontello. Typeface is Effra, designed by Jonas Schudel for Dalton Maag, and hosted through Adobe Fonts.

Profile 📸 by Molly Rowan.

Gratitude

Tremendous thanks to Maggie Armstrong, Molly Rowan, Brian Miller, Ryan Rud, Craig Gieselman, Michael Cullen-Benson, Kraig Schroth, Erin Merchant, and Alex O'Neal for feedback, support, troubleshooting, and inspiration.

🎁 Feedback is a gift. Can the site be improved? Email me and I will gladly reply.
